func.title: CreateConstruction

param.name: object_id
param.desc: Type of object to be created.

param.name: owner
param.desc: Owner of the new object (valid player number or NO_OWNER for no-owner).

param.name: completion
param.desc: Determines the initial completion of the object in percent (minimum 1).

param.name: adjust_terrain
param.desc: Determines whether the landscape at the creation site has to be adjusted to the objects basement.

param.name: check_site
param.desc: First checks the specified site for suitability.

func.desc: Should be used instead of CreateObject to create a building or construction site. In local calls the specified position will be an offset to the position of the calling object. If check_site is 1, the site is checked for suitability before creating the object. If the site is not suitable (e.g. rough ground or not enough space), a message is displayed above the calling object and the function returns nil.

example.text: Creates a complete wind generator at position 150/100 for player 1 and adjusts the landscape to the building.
Creates a steam engine construction finished by 30% site at position 200/100 with no owner, also adjusting the landscape.
